name: gluten-free
description: No wheat, barley, rye, or gluten-containing foods.

name: vegan
description: No animal products, including meat, dairy, eggs, or honey.

name: vegetarian
description: No meat, but may include dairy and eggs.

name: keto
description: Low-carb, high-fat diet with moderate protein.

name: paleo
description: Focuses on whole foods, avoiding processed foods and grains.

name: dairy-free
description: No milk, cheese, butter, or dairy-based products.
